PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Build Summary The only expensive piece of equipment you will have to purchase is Rigwald's Curse Rigwald's Curse. Besides that both the Facebreaker Facebreaker and Abyssus Abyssus are very cheap, even for great rolls. Getting a 6-Link is expensive in every build of course. Overall even on a 5-Link you can clear most of the content because the build is very budget-friendly. If you have the currency to spend though there is definitely room for improvement. The general idea was crafted between 3 theories, Vvckd, Alex & myself FiVVR. Gear and skill gems were by Vvckd; Nodes were by Alex while craft-combining was from me, FiVVR. You can check out the start of the build should you want this in Text https://www.poe-vault.com/guides/crit-facebreaker-impale-cyclone-champion-gear-jewels-and-flasks. Last final note, most of the unique gear here are cheap as we wanted to roll a cheap by effective build thanks to Vvckd
Pros 3.1.1. Pros + Hardcore viable + Decent clear speed while maintaining incredible single target damage + Decent damage mitigation + Playing a pure physical build means you will not be slowed down by monster Resistances in maps
Cons - Tankier and more budget-friendly compared to meta builds
Boots A well-rolled rare pair of Boots is best in slot. For labyrinth enchant, look for ?% increased Attack and Cast Speed if you?ve Killed Recently?. The Rare affix priority is:
+#% total Elemental Resistances (until capped) +# to maximum life (80) % increased Movement Speed (at least 20%)
Belt A well rolled rare Stygian Vise Stygian Vise can be very powerful for the build. Meginord's Girdle Meginord's Girdle is a great budget Belt that can be used. The Rare affix priority is:
+#% total Elemental Resistances (until capped) +# to maximum life (80) % increased Global Physical Damage (Jagged Fossil Jagged Fossil)
Clusters x2 One With Nothing Small Cluster Jewel for the node slots. (https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Delirium/pKKnMXbc0)
Jewels There are no mandatory Jewels for the build. You should at least try to acquire an Abyssal Jewel with Onslaught on Kill.
Regular Jewel Affix Priority % Increased Maximum life % increased Physical Damage % increased Melee Damage % increased Damage % increased Attack Speed while holding a Shield % increased Attack speed 3.2. Abyssal Jewel Affix Priority Maximum life (at least 30) % Chance to gain Onslaught on kill (at least 4%) Adds # to # Physical Damage to Attacks % chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
Ascendancy, Bandits, and Pantheons Major: Soul of Lunaris is a great Pantheon choice for the build, as it provides important Movement Speed along with additional Physical damage mitigation.
Minor: Soul of Ralakesh ? Provides a good mitigation to Bleeds and can make you immune to Maim and Blind.
Pantheon powers can be upgraded by using Divine Vessel in the Map Device while you are activating the particular Map that contains the boss you need. Once you've killed the boss and captured his soul, you need to deliver the vessel to Sin in Oriath.
------- FAQ ------- - How to deal with Mana problems? A single Mana Leech node on the passive tree like the one near Vitality Void will solve all of your Mana issues.
- What Map mods should be avoided? The build cannot do Physical Reflect and Cannot Leech. Another rough, but manageable mod is No Regeneration.
